INFUSIONS

Also: Arcane Ammunition, Blade Coatings, Combat Runes

When you successfully hit one or more targets with an attack, you may spend @LOSS[2 ip] to produce a special infusion and apply the corresponding effect to that attack (if the attack had the multi property, apply the effects of the infusion to each target).

You cannot apply more than one infusion to the same attack; producing and using an infusion are both part of the action you used to attack with the weapon.

BASIC INFUSIONS
INFUSIONSEFFECT
CryoThe attack deals 5 extra damage, and its damage becomes ice @ICON[ice].
PyroThe attack deals 5 extra damage, and its damage becomes fire @ICON[fire].
VoltThe attack deals 5 extra damage, and its damage becomes bolt @ICON[bolt].

ADVANCED INFUSIONS
INFUSIONSEFFECT
CycloneThe attack deals 5 extra damage, and its damage becomes air @ICON[air].
ExorcismThe attack deals 5 extra damage, and its damage becomes light @ICON[light].
SeismicThe attack deals 5 extra damage, and its damage becomes earth @ICON[earth].
ShadowThe attack deals 5 extra damage, and its damage becomes dark @ICON[dark].

SUPERIOR INFUSIONS
INFUSIONSEFFECT
Vampire

Choose one option: you recover an amount of HP equal to half the HP loss suffered by the target of the attack; or you recover an amount of MP equal to half the HP loss suffered by the target of the attack.

This infusion can only be used if the attack targeted a single creature.

VenomThe attack deals 5 extra damage, its damage becomes poison @ICON[poison], and each creature hit by the attack suffers poisoned.
